homepage.title: Eat Well, Live Better
homepage.subtitle: Smart nutrition for individuals and professionals
homepage.description: At Jameo Fit, we believe that good nutrition shouldn’t be complicated. Our platform connects young adults with nutritionists, combining personalized plans, practical recipes, and professional tracking in one digital ecosystem.
homepage.aditional_description: With technology that understands people and tools that empower specialists, we promote healthy and sustainable habits for everyone.
homepage.benefit3: Improve your well-being with professional support

for_you.title: What does Jameo Fit do for you?
for_you.benefit1_desc: Answer a short questionnaire and get a nutritional analysis tailored to you from the very first click. Nutritionists receive this information to further personalize your plan.
for_you.benefit2_desc: Track your progress with dynamic charts and weekly reports that speak your language. Specialists can review your progress and adjust your plan easily.
for_you.benefit3_desc: We design menus that adapt to your tastes, routine, and goals. For nutritionists, it’s a reliable tool to create and update evidence-based plans.
for_you.benefit4_desc: Enjoy a flexible experience that fits your lifestyle. At the same time, professionals have a digital ally to support you every step of the way.

how_it_works.title: How does it work?
how_it_works.step1: Answer a short questionnaire about your goals and preferences.
how_it_works.step2: Receive your personalized meal plan in seconds, backed by science and professionals.
how_it_works.step3: Adjust and track your progress with simple and visual tools, while your nutritionist supports you every step of the way.
